articles.title: Orangutan uses medicinal plant to treat wound in the wild, scientists say - KABC-TV
articles.description: Scientists observed Rakus pluck and chew up leaves of a medicinal plant used by people throughout Southeast Asia to treat pain and inflammation.
articles.content: WASHINGTON -- An orangutan appeared to treat a wound with medicine from a tropical plant - the latest example of how some animals attempt to soothe their own ills with remedies found in the wild, sci… [+2622 chars]
